welcome_message_body: Welcome to Windham, where small town charm meets outdoor adventure! Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, charming shops, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that Windham has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Jetport Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at International Jetport Airport, primarily used by regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Auburn Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Auburn Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
